Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes an optional twenty-five year retirement plan for fire marshals I or supervisors of such title in Suffolk county
Summary: Authorizes an optional twenty-five year retirement plan for fire marshals I and supervisors of such title in Suffolk county.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to an optional twenty-five year retirement plan for chief fire marshals, assistant chief fire marshals, fire marshals II, and fire marshals I in Suffolk county
